issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
We have seen the following exception when looking at topology visualization.  It looks like it was adding up the emitted tuples from a set of terminal bolts, so it should have been adding up a bunch of zeros.

fields.summary: Topology visualization causes integer overlfow error
